name: Rhythmcoil
description:
Rhytmcoil: Every beat, you shoot.

Your hands have been cursed, you're forced to shoot your way out of this mess.

Will you be able to survive?

Rythimcoil is a rhythm game where you shoot different weapons to stay alive  on beat while everything around you gets in the way. your chances are slim...

Controls: 

  • [Esc] - return to main menu
  • [X] or [Left mouse button] - shoot
